Description.Text: Just 1200 ft from Istanbul's Taksim Square, this designer hotel offers individually decorated rooms with free Wi-Fi and flat-screen TVs. Facilities include a spa with a fitness center. Rooms at Lush Hotel are air conditioned and feature stylish decor, in harmony with the hotel's interior design inspired by the city of Istanbul. All rooms have a work desk, satellite TV, minibar, and tea/coffee making facilities. Guests can enjoy daily buffet breakfast at the tastefully furnished courtyard. The bar offers a variety of refreshing drinks and snacks. Room service is also available. Guests of Lush can get a relaxing massage at the spa, and have a sauna. The hotel's front desk is open 24/7 and offers car rental and currency exchange services. Istiklal Street, with its many shops and restaurants, is only 1200 ft away. Hotel Lush is one mile from Dolmabahce Palace and Kabatas Ferry Terminal. The hotel also offers dry cleaning, lobby, reception and room service - 24 hrs.
Istiklal Street, with its many shops and restaurants, is only 1200 ft away. Hotel Lush is one mile from Dolmabahce Palace and Kabatas Ferry Terminal.

JUNIOR - ROOM - Junior Room offers one king bed with air conditioning, balcony / terrace, bathrobe bathroom amenities, cable / satellite TV, clothes dryer, ensuite / private bathroom, hairdryer, heating, internet access, jacuzzi / whirlpool / spa bath, kettle, laundry service, mini bar, non-smoking rooms, room service, safe in room, shaver in bathroom, tea and coffee making facilities and telephone. Windows open to view of the city. The room includes desk, LCD television with satellite channels. In-room safe, complimentary newspapers, ensuite bathroom includes shower with jetted bathtub, handheld showerhead, and rainfall shower head. Bath amenities include , designer toiletries, and makeup/shaving mirror, hypo-allergenic bedding and sewing kit and Iron/ironing board available on request.
